articles.description: As Americans debate reopening, the nation is still averaging about 1,000 COVID-19 deaths a day, roughly two 9/11 attacks every week.
articles.content:
The new coronavirus has spread like wildfire, killed  and spared  people of all ages and all health conditions, baffled doctors, defied guidance and conventional wisdom, and produced an unprecedented array of symptoms.

articles.title: Minnesota reaches 700 COVID-19 deaths, ICU cases rising - Bring Me The News
articles.description: Minnesota has now exceeded 700 deaths from the disease caused by the new coronavirus.
articles.content:
Another 17 people have died from COVID-19, bringing Minnesota's death toll from the disease to 700, according to Saturday's update from the Department of Health.
